cast.name: 塔皮洛·莫库纳 Thapelo Mokoena
西雅邦加·拉德贝 Siyabonga Radebe
曼迪萨·恩杜纳 Mandisa Nduna

introduction: 'Between Friends' is a stylish, funny tale of a group of college friends reuniting after 7 years at an up-market Game Lodge in South Africa. When old friends know all your buried secrets, tensions are bound to arise in current relationships when those secrets are revealed. Will Nkanyiso's engagement to Nisha survive his seeing his old flame Linda with her Canadian fiance? And will Winston and Portia's tumultuous marriage endure the scrutiny and embittered ribbing of older brother Njabulo? Award-winning TV director Zuko Nodada first film heralds a new wave of South African genre films made for Africans with high production values and focused on entertainment.
